definition: plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
store/front room of house serving as shop

sentences.english: The circular courtyard, in front of the ancestral hall, is also paved with granite plate.
sentences.chinese: 回望祖堂前的圓形天井，也同樣是以花崗石板鋪面。

sentences.english: The details of the facade will be further fitted up to match the interior.
sentences.chinese: 鋪面將進一步加以裝修使之與室內裝飾協調一致。

sentences.english: The flower downstairs upstairs is interspersed, the shop front is meticulous and graceful.
sentences.chinese: 樓上樓下鮮花點綴，鋪面精細而高雅。

sentences.english: In at least one case, there was a long and wide crack on a metalled road.
sentences.chinese: 至少有一條碎石鋪面的道路出現又長又寬的裂縫。

sentences.english: Feng Poly Street to get the day retreat to the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 馮廣聚把到手的天街鋪面給退了。

definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
to lay (railroad tracks, carpet, pipeline)/to install (wiring, cable)/to construct (road, concrete slab)
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
